title: 1 vs 100 Xbox Reboot?
description:

transcript_chunks.text: probably not likely to happen but also maybe prediction that could still happen they were working on one versus 100 at one point they're still doing it at this point it feels like a kind of a long shot but if they like if that was like the shadow drop I would like I would lose my mind that would be such a perfect game for that uh so I'm going to like hold on to some hope and believe that that could happen that would be incredible
